trans-unit.source: Defines methods and properties for writing a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Define métodos e propriedades para a gravação de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> method in order to obtain a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> writer for adding <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> content to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> método para obter um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> gravador para adicionar <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> conteúdo para um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: A writer for outputting the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Um gravador para gerar o novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddFixedDocument%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o método <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddFixedDocument%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The image type to write.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de imagem a ser gravado.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> image for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma imagem <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> novo para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: For example, the `imageType` might be <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.JpegImageType> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.PngImageType>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o `imageType` podem ser <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.JpegImageType> ou <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.PngImageType>.

trans-unit.source: Only one thumbnail image can represent the document sequence as a whole (although individual documents and pages can have their own thumbnail images).
trans-unit.target: Apenas uma imagem em miniatura pode representar a sequência de documento como um todo (embora páginas e documentos individuais podem ter suas próprias imagens em miniatura).

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown if <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddThumbnail(System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType)" /> is called when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> already has a thumbnail.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> é gerada se <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddThumbnail(System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType)" /> é chamado quando o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> já tem uma miniatura.

trans-unit.source: Flushes and closes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> writer.
trans-unit.target: Libera e fecha o gravador de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.Commit%2A> method to flush and close the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> writer.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.Commit%2A> método para liberar e fechar o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> gravador.

trans-unit.source: Sets a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> that is being written.
trans-unit.target: Define um <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> que está sendo gravado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> that represents a default printing configuration for the sequence.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> que representa uma configuração de impressão padrão para a sequência.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property does not validate or modify the specified <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: A definição dessa propriedade não validar ou modificar especificado <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> para um determinado <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specific <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Se necessário, use o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> método para criar um <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-específico <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> que é válido para uma impressora especificada.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.PrintTicket%2A> property to associate a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.PrintTicket%2A> propriedade para associar um <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> com o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> that is being written.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> que está sendo gravado.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> that is being written.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> que está sendo gravado.
